comments:
Create a 3-diagonal block matrix as banded.

The matrix has the following structure:

DB... ADB.. .ADB. ..ADB ...AD

The blocks A, B and D are 3-by-3 matrices. The D matrices has the form d * I.

Parameters ---------- A : ndarray, shape (n, 3, 3) Stack of A blocks. B : ndarray, shape (n, 3, 3) Stack of B blocks. d : ndarray, shape (n + 1,) Values for diagonal blocks.
##### Returns
